snippet.title: Pizza Kidd: Game Demo | Beat 'em Up Anime Trailer | Sci-Fi Horror Pixel Art Action
snippet.description:
Play Our Demo on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2105260/Pizza_Kidd/
PIZZA KIDD (ピザキッド) an all new, stylish, combat driven 2-D beat-em-up set in a dark sci-fantasy world—featuring uniquely drawn 16-bit pixel art with an aesthetic heavily inspired by 90's anime, graphic novels, and quarter munching arcade brawlers.
#pizzakidd #indie  #gaming
__
#wishlist on STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2105260/Pizza_Kidd
—
Join the Pizza Kidd Game #discord for details and demo access:
https://discord.gg/v2uvZTbXdE
—
Team Pizza Kidd...
[Art Direction—Drumat!c, Illustration & Animation—Olvy, Pixels—René, Music—Kevin Ripley, Sound Design & Video Editing—Mordi, Gameplay & Coding—Slime, Production—Calv aka Beto Chavez]
—
Game Developed by:
© 2022 Kidd Games, LLC — PizzaKidd: The Game
www.pizzakidd.com
—
Twitter — @KiddPizza
Instagram — @pizzakidd_thegame
